ygData.subject: Re: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Either you or I have read it wrong. By my way of looking at it, this will leave more corpses lying around. When someone is ressurected, they loot their
ygData.messageBody:
> Actually I am kinda happy about this one.. I know for a fact I am tired of
> seeing all the bodies in some zones... this will help out a lot in that.

Either you or I have read it wrong. By my way of looking at it, this will
leave more corpses lying around. When someone is ressurected, they loot
their corpse and it disappears. If they aren't ressurected, they take longer
to get to their corpse (presumably, unless they are standing next to it and
only doing to regain exp) and so the corpse stays around longer, continuing
to clutter your view.

Salt
